triples.name: Unmanned aerial vehicle
triples.relevance: UAVs are the central subject of this comprehensive review paper.

triples.name: Artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: AI is highlighted as a key development area for UAV research.

triples.name: Remote sensing
triples.relevance: Remote sensing is identified as an important application area for UAVs.

triples.name: Control system
triples.relevance: Control systems and algorithms are extensively discussed for aircraft control.

triples.name: Swarm robotics
triples.relevance: Swarming and cooperative control of multiple UAVs is explored as a research direction.

triples.name: Scopus
triples.relevance: Scopus database is used to quantify and analyze research trends in the UAV field.

triples.name: Aircraft flight control system
triples.relevance: Aircraft control systems and algorithms are core topics discussed in the review.
